ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 23
ygData.msgSnippet: I have combine scims as well (Silverish Scim I am coming for you) and I hit ALOT.  My partners say that all the see in combat is; Jaade hits for 10 Jaade hits
ygData.messageBody:
I have combine scims as well (Silverish Scim I am coming for you) and I hit
ALOT. My partners say that all the see in combat is;

Jaade hits for 10
Jaade hits for 11
Jaade hits for 7
Jaade hits for 8
Jaade hits for 11

Well you get my point. I prefer the speed attacks over the one big attack,
but I still have my eye on the executioners axe.

> ----------
> From: Andrew Palmer[SMTP:apalmer@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 2:00 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 23
>
> From: Andrew Palmer <apalmer@...>
>
> I have found with my duel combine scim's that i double and trip and quad
> attack very often you may want to try that.
> On Sun, 23 May 1999, Paul Jesernig wrote:
>
> > From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
> >
> > I'm going the big two handed sword route myself (a shiny brass halberd
> is
> > my weapon now), but what I have heard from a source I trust (my guild
> > leader who was a warrior like I was in beta) is to put the faster weapon
> in
> > your main hand. The 2nd attack goes based on when the first one does.
> The
> > more often the first one swings, the more often the 2nd does also.
> Spirit
> > of the bear, a shaman spell, though others may get it also, will keep
> your
> > stamina up.
> >
> > Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ CT
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > >Have a Mino Axe and a bastard sword. both 8dmg and 32/35.
> >
> > Keep this combination of weapons?
> > If not, which should I switch?
> > Does it matter which is in my primary had?<
